attributes.action: cut taxes on alcohol and allow drinking in public places such as town centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: cut taxes on alcohol and allow drinking in public places such as town centres, what are we people who cannot afford alcohol in pubs and have no homes to go to to drink in? Sign this petition if you want to regain your civil liberties in which you as a nation should be proud of having.
